snippet: The increase was a result of an extended effort to recruit minorities and women to take an updated exam, after a judge ruled that the last test, given in 2007, was discriminatory.
lead_paragraph: The increase was a result of an extended effort to recruit minorities and women to take an updated exam, after a judge ruled that the last test, given in 2007, was discriminatory.

headline.seo: New York Fire Department Gains Minority and Female Applicants
headline.main: Fire Dept. Doubles Minority and Female Applicants
headline.print_headline: Fire Department Doubles Minority and Female Applicants
